about_the_game:
In Inferno Pathways, embark on a chilling journey through the abandoned and haunted tunnels of a once-bustling metro system. Guided by a mysterious voice on the radio and the flickering beam of your flashlight, navigate a labyrinth of dark corridors and forgotten chambers. This first-person horror experience will test your resolve and sanity as you uncover the sinister secrets hidden deep within the underground.

Story:

You are Mike Collins, a man tormented by his past. Once a respected mechanic, your life unraveled after a tragic accident. Haunted by guilt and plagued by alcoholism, you now work as a night shift maintenance worker in the metro. One fateful night, an unforeseen event traps you in an endless maze of tunnels, with no apparent way out.

As you wander the seemingly infinite underground labyrinth, a voice crackles through the static of a found radio. The voice belongs to Ashton Roth, a lawyer who claims to be trapped in the same nightmare. Ashton promises to guide you to safety, but you'll need to work together.

Features:

  • Atmospheric Horror: Explore the claustrophobic and unsettling environments of the metro tunnels, where every shadow and sound can send chills down your spine.
  • Immersive Storytelling: Uncover the haunting backstory of Mike Collins and Ashton Roth through detailed environmental storytelling, chilling audio logs, and scattered notes.
  • Puzzles and Exploration: Solve intricate puzzles to unlock new areas and piece together the dark secrets of the metro. Use your wits and limited resources to survive the horrors lurking in the shadows.
  • First-Person Experience: Immerse yourself fully in the terror with a first-person perspective that puts you directly in Mike's shoes, heightening the sense of dread and vulnerability.
  • Psychological Horror: Experience a narrative-driven game that delves into themes of guilt, redemption, and the human psyche, challenging you to confront your deepest fears.
  • Dynamic Sound Design: Every creak, whisper, and echo will keep you on edge, enhancing the terrifying atmosphere of the metro tunnels.

Can you escape the darkness that lies beneath?



Navigate the twisted underground, uncover the truth, and face your demons. The descent into madness begins here.

Add to your wishlist and stay tuned for updates!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU, such as Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 8-core CPU, such as Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Descend into the abandoned metro in Inferno Pathways, a first-person psychological horror game. Navigate dark tunnels, solve puzzles, and uncover sinister secrets. Confront your deepest fears and piece together the haunting story of Mike Collins. Can you escape the darkness?

English*, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
